title: The Golden dragons

abstract: Bendigo - A tradition of performance that links generations
description: Bendigo - Bendigo's annual Easter parade has featured the Dragon and Lion dancers from the Bendigo Chinese Association for over 100 years. This mini documentary explores how this historical tradition has helped shape the identities of the dancers and features interviews combined with footage of their colourful and exciting dance held at dusk at the Dragons' spiritual home - Bendigo's Golden Dragon Museum of Australia
